abstract.t: Short Message Service (SMS) messages have become very popular amongmobile phone users. However, the service providing is stillrelatively awkward. This draft presents an encoding and a simpleprotocol for describing and submitting SMS messages over theInternet. The protocol is aimed to be used between service providersand SMS gateways. The SMS messages are encoded in XML and thecorresponding Document Type Definition (DTD) for the messagestructure is described
